alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Louisa and Fluvanna Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Orange to near Schuyler. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Louisa, Palmyra, Fork Union, Lake Monticello, Columbia, Ferncliff, Boswells Tavern, Kents Store, Troy, Gordonsville, Scottsville, Green Springs, Shores, Central Plains, Cohasset, Waldrop, Trevilians, Hardware, Wilmington and Cunningham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Virginia.
